channel.title: Webclient
channel.description:
I was trying to use smfnew to host a webclient. I made a html page with the link to my jarred client from dldropbox.. But I get an error saying classnotfoundexception... client.class
Does anyone know the solution to this problem?

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

Try this:

Delete all your .class files and re-compile, re-jar your client and test it in a folder just incase it doesn’t work this time

Read full topic
